items.sentence: What makes you think that Tom\'s interested in helping us?
Tell Tom that I\'m not interested in going there with him.
I can\'t imagine a native speaker ever saying it that way.
Tom told Mary how much he enjoyed watching baseball on TV.
Tom told Mary that he thought she should lose some weight.
Tom told Mary that she should quit pretending to be angry.
There\'s only one person who can do that, and that\'s Tom.
Sometimes Tom doesn\'t really understand what\'s going on.
Tom wanted Mary to go to the supermarket to buy some milk.
Tom doesn\'t always arrive on time, but Mary usually does.
